name: Kiwi Kid
description:
SHOOT THOSE FURIOUS UGLY MONSTERS

Play as the Kiwi kid who doesn't look like kiwi but whatever

Great  art and music.. I think

Multiple monsters to test your skills on! , yeah I don't know why but this game is hard

A variety of MIGHTY weapons to Wield and Master... only 3 tbh

A rich no-story story told by the blood of those you kill!!

There is also a PRINCESS TO SAVE! , for those who care
